talk.author: did:plc:heaxpu5qpcdztqgxqc46k5gu
talk.utter:
That wouldn’t happen though. People have been trying to make Reddit clones for years with next to no success. Twitter replacements are either DOA for general use like Mastodon or too decentralized to be addictive like BS. 

The election gave BS a golden opportunity; I don’t think there’ll be a 2nd

talk.author: did:plc:b62owfzpn4uch4wqu4vd5c4o
talk.utter: I don’t think you quite understand. It wouldn’t be a Bluesky competitor or clone, it would still be Bluesky. All your existing users and posts would still be there, just on a different app. As always, whether it would work out that cleanly irl remains to be seen, but that’s the idea of ATProto.

talk.author: did:plc:heaxpu5qpcdztqgxqc46k5gu
talk.utter: Evidently I didn’t, that’s interesting. So a client like Apollo essentially, to continue the Reddit comparison?
